sourcesContent:
import React, {memo, useRef} from 'react' import {useSelector, useDispatch, shallowEqual} from 'react-redux' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import {getSizeImage, formatTime} from '@/utils/format-data' import {Slider} from 'antd' import {MidWrapper} from './style' export default memo(function MidContent(props) { const {currentIndex, playlist} = useSelector((state) => ({ currentIndex: state.getIn(['player', 'currentIndex']), playlist: state.getIn(['player', 'playlist']), }) ) // playedTime const {playTime} = props return (
{playlist[currentIndex] && playlist[currentIndex].name} {playlist[currentIndex] && playlist[currentIndex].ar[0].name}
{formatTime(playTime)}  / {playlist[currentIndex] && formatTime(playlist[currentIndex].dt)}
) })
